subject: Re: [junit] junit+jdk1.4.1+compatibility
msgSnippet: ... What do you mean? ... In the time it takes to wait for the answer, you could have downloaded JUnit, tried it, not seen any problems, and been using it. :)
messageBody:
Rajeev R wrote:

> Is junit fully compatible with jdk1.4.1?

What do you mean?

> Please help.

In the time it takes to wait for the answer, you could have downloaded
JUnit, tried it, not seen any problems, and been using it. :)
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
